about_the_game:
TOMB OF FRIENDS +!!!
An improved version of the "classic" game from the year 28117.

In Tomb of Friends +, journey with Rob, Meg and Oz into a mysterious temple full of weird people who simply want to be your friends.
Make friends, unlock secrets, analyze lore, and have a swell time in this super unique adventure videogame software collection!

~HERE ARE SOME FEATURES~
  • 3 playable Characters!!!
  • Friends!!
  • Secrets?
  • "Jokes"
  • COLLECTIBLES
  • Gremlin mariachis!

SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR........... Um.... Please buy this game I am starving

content_descriptors.notes: There are lots of swear words and a fair amount of blood and gore.
